forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 70F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning sunshine, then windy with periods of showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Thunder possible. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h, becoming SE and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph, becoming SE and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Clearing late. Low -3C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 28F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with periods of light rain and snow later at night. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Mostly cloudy late. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
